translations: n．无产阶级：社会阶层中不拥有生产资料，以出卖劳动力为生的工人阶层。
· The proletarians have nothing to lose but their chains.
无产者失去的只是锁链。

sentences.sentence: Not only should proletarians emancipate themselves but also the whole mankind.
sentences.translation: 无产者不仅要解放他们自己，而且要解放全人类。

sentences.sentence: Under what conditions does this sale of the labor of the proletarians to the bourgeoisie take place?
sentences.translation: 第五个问题∶ 无产者是在怎样的条件下把劳动出卖给资产者的？

sentences.sentence: Proletarians why not of the world unite, courageously however up? They do nothing but chains will not lose!
sentences.translation: 全世界无产者为什么不会团结起来，奋然而起？他们除了锁链什么都不会失去！
